title: Combine Object Arrays
description: In this lab, we will be working on a JavaScript programming exercise aimed at combining two arrays of objects based on a specified property. The purpose of this exercise is to help you practice using the Array.prototype.reduce() method and object manipulation in JavaScript, which are essential skills for any developer working with JavaScript. By the end of this lab, you should be able to seamlessly combine two arrays of objects based on a property to create a new array.

meta.title: Combine Object Arrays: A Comprehensive JavaScript Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to combine two arrays of objects based on a specified property using JavaScript's Array.prototype.reduce() method.

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
